title: Baby Clams with Chilli & Spaghetti
ingredients: ['250g John West Baby Clams, drained with juice reserved', '4 tbsp Olive Oil', '3 cloves Chopped Garlic', '1 Red Chille, de-seeded and chopped', '3 tbsp Shredded Basil', '200g Cherry Tomatoes, halved', 'Splash White Wine', '110g Cooked spaghetti, al dente']
